text: Cora Faith Walker (1984/1985 â€“ March 11, 2022) was an American Democratic politician. She was a member of the Missouri House of Representatives for the 74th district from January 2017 to July 2019. On July 29, 2019, Walker resigned from the Missouri House of Representatives and became the policy director for St. Louis County executive Sam Page. Walker died on March 11, 2022 in Ferguson, Missouri at the age of 37. ==References== Category:1980s births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Cora Faith Walker
